description:
Ultimate Ableton 8 Course is a bundle of three Ableton Live Tutorial Packs. Our tutors John, Steve and Chris will guide you through a series of 36 Ableton Tutorials, demonstrating the most used techniques in producing Deep, Electro, Tech, Tribal and Progressive House Tracks.

Course Details:

  • Over 7 hours of pure production techniques!
  • You will learn how to produce 36 House Tracks in Ableton Live 8.
  • You will have access to the Ableton Templates, Audio Samples and Sylenth1 Presets used in each episode.

Course Objective:

  • Extend your music production skills.
  • Learn the standard techniques behind chord progression, bassline patterns, drums, stabs and vocals.
  • Get inspired and creative!

Techniques explained:

  • Simple Drum Patterns, Effects and Tricks
  • Advanced Bassline Patterns and Progressions
  • Advanced Chord Progression and Structure
  • Advanced Vocal Editing
  • Stabs, Pads, Arpegios and more.

Teaching Style:

  • Each Episode is quick (10 min. average), straight to the point and easy to follow. No large pauses or too much talking.
  • Each Episode covers the main part of a different style of House Tracks.
  • Each Episode is independent, so you can follow them in any order.

Notes:

  • This is not a "Sound design course".
  • This is not a "How to create a full track course".
  • Check out the Free Episodes of each pack in order to get used with our teaching style.

Requirements:

  • Ableton Live 8 | We use a lot of the built-in presets.
  • External VST: Sylenth1, Ravity, First Call Horns, B8 Organ(free), DSK(free)
title: Ultimate Ableton 8: How To Produce 36 House Tracks
